price: If your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind a single community, but they will not cease to differ[60],
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ
footnotes: [60] They will ever be followers of different religions, ways of life and opinions.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
